original: Araṇaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
